title: Ranked pick and ban bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: i was in pick and ban for a ranked game, and i was unable to lock in my indicated champion to ban, i was spamming the ban button and nothing was happening, but i could still see the animation as i hover over and select champions to ban, this resulted in a -3lp lost to my account. there is an image above that i screenshot after i got kicked from the game, is it possible that i can get my 3 lp back? i know 3lp is not a lot but i still would like to have it back nonetheless
